mapper.select: SELECT b.depart_name, c.product_name, d.collect_point,sum(a.sl_t) as sl_t FROM `hte_ck_product` a left join sys_depart b on b.org_code = a.site_id left join hte_product c on c.id = a.product_id left join hte_collect_point d on d.id = a.collect_id WHERE a.check_flag = 2 and date(a.tz_date) between #{fromDate} and #{toDate} and d.collect_point='排放口' group by b.depart_name, c.product_name, d.collect_point

SELECT b.depart_name, c.product_name, d.collect_point, sum(a.sl_t) as sl_t FROM `hte_ck_product` a left join sys_depart b on b.org_code = a.site_id left join hte_product c on c.id = a.product_id left join hte_collect_point d on d.id = a.collect_id WHERE a.check_flag = 2 and date(a.tz_date) between #{fromDate} and #{toDate} and product_name='总泥量' group by b.depart_name, c.product_name, d.collect_point
